workflows.creator: 3187a563-5419-4c46-a302-acd8e9deda65
workflows.title: Add Chatter post - When VIN report is generated or failed
workflows.description: This workflow will be adding a chatter post whenever VIN report is generated successfully or there is an error while trying to generate the VIN report.

script-1.title: Format  Numbers
script-1.description: Formatting the Last Reported Mileage, Current Mileage and Seller Expected Mileage as per the format of the Chatter Post

boolean-condition-2.title: Checking Salvage Issue
boolean-condition-2.description: Boolean condition to check if any Salvage issue exist in the VIN by fetching the value of HasTitleIssue Flag.

salesforce-8.title: Chatter - Request Timed Out
salesforce-8.description: Adding Chatter Post for the scenario when Vin error report code is REQUEST_TIMEOUT

salesforce-7.title: Chatter - Invalid VIN
salesforce-7.description: Adding Chatter Post for the scenario when Vin error report code is INVALID_VIN

salesforce-12.title: Create Feed Attachment
salesforce-12.description: Creating feed attachment of the uploaded file to attach it in the Chatter Post

call-workflow-1.title: Fetch System Id
call-workflow-1.description: Calling the Salesforce Config workflow to fetch the id of System user

boolean-condition-1.title: Checking Mileage Issue
boolean-condition-1.description: Boolean condition to check if any Mileage issue exist in the VIN by fetching the value of HasMileageIssue Flag.

salesforce-4.title: Uploading file from URL
salesforce-4.description: Uploading the file to Salesforce so that it can  be attached in the Chatter Post

salesforce-16.title: Create Feed Attachment
salesforce-16.description: Creating feed attachment of the uploaded file to attach it in the Chatter Post

salesforce-13.title: Seller Reported Mileage
salesforce-13.description: Fetching the Seller Reported Mileage from the Offer Id received in the event

salesforce-5.title: Create Feed Attachment
salesforce-5.description: Creating feed attachment of the uploaded file to attach it in the Chatter Post

salesforce-1.title: Chatter - Mileage/Salvage
salesforce-1.description: Creating the chatter post body for scenario when both Salvage and Title Issues are found

value.value:
VIN report attached.

Possible issues found.

1. Last recorded mileage was {$.steps.script-1.result.lastReported} on {$.steps.date-time-helpers-1.result}. Current estimated mileage is {$.steps.script-1.result.currentExpected}. Seller reported mileage is {$.steps.script-1.result.sellerReported}.

2. Salvage title detected.

date-time-helpers-1.title: Formatting Date
date-time-helpers-1.description: The date and time received would here be formatted as per the requirement of the chatter post
